News

22 october 2016

New type of covers

Now you can use new covers for our bases: mahogany, wenge, bog oak.

New covers are available for: R160B, R260B, R460B, R560B, R170B, R270B, R470B, R180B, R580B, P130B, P248B, S26B, S212B, S215B, S218B, S225B, S230B, S235B, S24B, S255B, S275B, S230UB, P460D, P460CD, P560D, P560CD, S231B, P535B, S384B, S3100B.
